linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.4ghz dual core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB, OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9.5 or above
  • Processor: 2.4ghz dual core CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB, OpenGL 3.2 compatible GPU
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Open AL compatible
  • Additional Notes: Base game requires 60MB Disk Space; soundtrack requires additional 30MB
